translations: （使）个性化；（使）区别开来；选出；把……个体化（individuate 的过去式及过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Seal and all nature kingdoms experience not death upon an individuated basis.
sentences.translation: 海豹与一切自然王国均并不以个体体验死亡。

sentences.sentence: In seeing all truths simultaneously, one will see how each individuated truth is necessary to the whole dance.
sentences.translation: 在同时看到所有真相中，你将看见为什么每一个体真相均对整体舞蹈必要。

sentences.sentence: When I consciously assess myself first and then invite feedback from others, I offer myself the possibility of becoming more individuated.
sentences.translation: 当我首先有意识地接触我自己，然后邀请他人的反馈时，我提供了自己一些可能性可以更加成为我自己。
